pinyin: Ke3 kou3 Ke3 le4 Gong1 si1

definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: The Coca-Cola Company is a great example of repeating past successes.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂公司是一個重複過去成功經驗的偉大榜樣。

sentences.english: Coca-Cola reports its third-quarter profits were up 14 percent.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂公司報告其第三季度利潤增長百分之十四。

sentences.english: Both beverages were provided by The Coca-Cola Company's Beverage Institute for Health & Wellness.
sentences.chinese: 兩種橙汁均由可口可樂公司衛生健康飲料協會提供。

sentences.english: Candler aggressively advertised Coca-Cola in newspapers and on billboards.
sentences.chinese: 坎德勒積極宣傳可口可樂公司在報紙和廣告牌。

sentences.english: Coca-Cola is a Motley Fool Income Investor pick.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂公司是一個傻瓜式收入的投資選擇。

definition: lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Ji2 tuan2

definition: Time Warner Inc., US media company

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
